ça c'est le pire.definition: A French phrase used as an [interjection] which [literally] translates to "that's the worst" (pronounced 'Sah Say luh PEER').  Can be used to express regret or [disappointment], or to show anger.
ça c'est le pire.example:
Boy - Wow, my [neighbor] stole all my dog's [puppies] and put them in a sack and beat them against [the wall] until they were all dead.

Boy #2 - Wow, ça c'est le pire.
